alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY... WESTERN LIBERTY AND NORTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spring, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Humble, Spring, Kingwood, Barrett, Crosby, Oak Ridge North, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Plum Grove, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Atascocita, Chateau Woods, Lake Houston Dam, Lake Houston, Hurricane Harbor Splashtown, Porter Heights, New Caney, and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty
